description.value:
Whenever you use your Inertial Shield ability, you can then use the Knockback maneuver as a free triggered action.

Additionally, as your discipline grows, your psionic potential is amplified, granting benefits from the Metakinetic Mastery table. Benefits are cumulative except where an improved benefit replaces a lesser benefit.

Discipline

Benefit

2

Whenever you use the Knockback maneuver, the forced movement distance gains a bonus equal to your Intuition score.

4

The first time in a combat round that you take damage or are force moved, you gain 1 surge, even if you resist the effect.

6

You gain an edge on the Grab and Knockback maneuvers.

8 (4th Level)

The first time in a combat round that you take damage or are force moved, you gain 2 surges, even if you resist the effect.

10 (7th Level)

You have a double edge on the Grab and Knockback maneuvers.

12 (10th Level)

Whenever you force move a target, the forced movement distance gains a bonus equal to your Intuition score. Additionally, whenever you use a heroic ability, you gain [[/heal 10 temp]].
